summary: This bill, the "Small Business Representation in Contracting Rulemaking Act," aims to increase the representation of small businesses in federal contracting regulations. It mandates the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to be added to the Federal Acquisition Regulatory Council and requires the Administrator to submit a report detailing the resources needed for this role and suggesting changes to laws and regulations to assist in fulfilling duties as a member of the council. This report is to be submitted to relevant congressional committees.
